channel.title: www.Aganoth.com
channel.description:
I'm requesting that my website, http://www.aganoth.com be approved.
It's a website that I'll use for my server once development has finished.

item.title: www.Aganoth.com
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Here’s just what I understood from when the advertisement section/this section were created…

If you plan on posting your website link in your server development and/or development team threads, you need to get it approved so that we can confirm that it is not advertising (and this is done simply by seeing if there is a working ‘play’ link [ie, not just a website placeholder]). In other words, you could NOT post the link you just gave us in those two sections, because it’s clearly advertising.

However, to post in the server advertisements board, you do NOT need to get your website approved, as it is implied you will be advertising anyways. All other rules (like selling staff) are reactionary, not precautionary.

If your website is not approved to be posted in the development sections (because it’s advertising), you still have the option to post your server advertisement thread link inside your development threads.

That’s my understanding anyways, someone can correct me if I’m wrong.

Read full topic
